text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Okay. Then, let's try to solve this 
problem using the Pythagorean theorem.

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Find the height and volume of this square pyramid. 
……Who wants to solve this～?

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Hmmmm～. Looks like there're no volunteers. 
Then……Verxina-san, could I ask you to do it?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Yes. I understand.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
We'll call the intersection of this perpendicular line with the 
base, M――And if we find the length of AM――Then the answer is――

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text: Correct! As splendid as always, Verxina-san!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, no. It's because sensei explained 
it in a very simple to understand manner.

text_block_list.name: Students
text_block_list.text: 『Uwoooh-……!』 『As expected～……!』 『Ooooh～……』

text_block_list.name: Troubled Student
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm～……I just can't seem to step-in correctly here――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Oh. Are you having a little trouble?

text_block_list.name: Troubled Student
text_block_list.text:
!? V-Verxina-senpai!? 
No, well……this step, I just can't get it right――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Oh, a Ball Change……that is kind of hard, huh――but rather 
than thinking about it, it's better to go with the rhythm.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
――Let's try it together. 
Let's start slow. Why don't you try matching me?

text_block_list.name: Troubled Student
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? Together with Verxina-senpai……!? 
That's too much for me――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, it'll be fine. You don't need to be so tense―― 
It's an opportunity so let's try to master it today.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Fuu……with this, Barbell Squats are finished.

text_block_list.name: Students Observing
text_block_list.text:
『Ooooh～……As expected of Verxina-san……』 
『3 sets of over 300 just like that――』

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Alright. Next, let's move on to Bench Press.

text_block_list.name: Assertive Student
text_block_list.text: Ah! Let me be your spotter!

text_block_list.name: Hesitant Student
text_block_list.text: Hey!? That's not fair! Me too――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Now, now, don't fight. Let's see―― 
Then, you can help with the next training exercise――

――Even during training, there were a fair share of admirers 
that would sneak peeks at her. She really was a model student――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……Fuu.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, Trainer-san. Even though today's menu is 
finished, asking you to record a video of my running.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I really just want to confirm my form each day―― 
Once I get back to the dorms, I'll review it closely.

Whether it was academics or running, she was 
always working hard behind the scenes. She even 
studied in her free time in the trainers' office.

All of it was to reach the 『Peak』――to be the one that 
her sisters looked up to. She truly was outstanding――

……Since Verxina was like that, 
should I really stay the way I am?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――Trainer-san. Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
There's still some time until training starts, 
so I was thinking of having some tea.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: If you'd like, how about joining me?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, then I'll make the tea. 
Trainer-san, can I leave the snacks to go with the tea to you?

Did she notice that I was worried about something?―― 
I really do……need to improve myself to be able to help Verxina.
